wiod.diagrammer
  • Reference

Rescale values to the [0,1] range

A helper function -- normalise/rescale values so that they fit into a range from 0 to 1. (The minimum value becomes 0 and the maximum value becomes 1).

normalise(numvec)

Arguments

numvec

A numeric vector

Value

A numeric vector with values in the range [0,1].

Examples

x <- seq(from=-3.7, to=6.5, by=1.36)
y <- normalise(x)
data.frame(x,y)
#>       x         y
#> 1 -3.70 0.0000000
#> 2 -2.34 0.1428571
#> 3 -0.98 0.2857143
#> 4  0.38 0.4285714
#> 5  1.74 0.5714286
#> 6  3.10 0.7142857
#> 7  4.46 0.8571429
#> 8  5.82 1.0000000
#     x          y
# -3.70  0.0000000
# -2.34  0.1428571
# -0.98  0.2857143
#  0.38  0.4285714
#  1.74  0.5714286
#  3.10  0.7142857
#  4.46  0.8571429
#  5.82  1.0000000
